notes.note:
Local translation models are now compressed with [Zstandard][1], reducing download sizes and on-device storage consumption. As always, all Firefox translations happen securely and privately on your local device, unlike other browsers that translate using cloud services.


  [1]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zstd

text:
Thanks for using Firefox! Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you at [Android Support][1]


  [1]: https://mzl.la/AndroidSupport
title: Firefox for Android 145.0 Release
